[True Transmogrification](/Feats.aspx?ID=2941) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 73 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

You transmogrify your eidolon each day. During your daily preparations, you can swap out any number of your [evolution](/Traits.aspx?ID=394) feats, each for a different evolution feat of an appropriate level for which you meet the prerequisites. These swaps last until your next daily preparations.
